meanings.definition: A test of knowledge, typically consisting of a series of questions or tasks.
meanings.sent1: The students took weekly quizzes to check their understanding of the material.
meanings.sent2: She scored high on the history quiz by studying diligently.
meanings.sent3: During the quiz, the teacher accidentally dropped all the answer sheets.
meanings.sent4: The quiz was a mountain of questions waiting to be conquered by the students.
meanings.sent5: The intense quiz made her sweat with nervousness.

meanings.definition: To test someone's knowledge or understanding in a brief, informal way.
meanings.sent1: The teacher quizzes the students to see if they remember the lesson.
meanings.sent2: He quizzes his friends on movie trivia during lunch break.
meanings.sent3: She quizzes her cat on its ability to catch a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The detective quizzes the suspect to uncover the truth.
meanings.sent5: The coach quizzes the players before the big game to ensure they are prepared.
